nodes.text: Rhon Bes was a male Weequay who worked for the Contraband Resale Corporation during the Galactic War, when he sold embargoed items on Vaiken Spacedock.

Rhon Bes was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Digital Expansion Rise of the Hutt Cartel, where he was the Embargoed Items vendor in Vaiken Spacedock's Cartel Bazaar. However, he was later removed from the game.
